tooltipNotifications.displayString: Inspired by lore and legends from a distant universe!

displayProperties.description:
Summon an electrified dagger and throw it in your aim direction.

When the dagger hits a surface or a target, you blink to its location and perform a powerful whirling strike, damaging any nearby targets. Can be reactivated after the strike to perform additional throws.

If the dagger flies for long enough without impacting anything, it detonates and you blink to the detonation location.
displayProperties.name: Storm's Edge

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
Ability not yet unlocked.

Found in the Traveler's Pale Heart.

displayProperties.description:
Tether foes to a Void Anchor, weakening and suppressing them for you and your allies.

The Void Anchors fired from Shadowshot pull targets toward the impact point, which then become traps and wait for prey. Void Anchors have increased range and last longer.
displayProperties.name: Shadowshot: Deadfall

displayProperties.description:
Summon a precision flaming pistol that disintegrates targets with Solar Light.

Your Golden Gun deals massively increased precision damage, overpenetrates targets, and creates Orbs of Power on precision hits.

Benefits from being radiant.
displayProperties.name: Golden Gun: Marksman

displayProperties.description:
Summon two Stasis kamas, Silence and Squall, that you throw one after another.

Silence : Creates a flash-freeze blast that freezes and damages targets.

Squall : Creates a Stasis Storm that slows and damages targets caught inside.
displayProperties.name: Silence and Squall

displayProperties.description:
Weave a vicious rope dart and tear through your targets.

[Light Attack]  : Swing the rope dart in front of you to deal damage. The tip of the dart deals bonus damage, and defeating targets with the tip causes them to explode.

[Heavy Attack]  : Swing the rope dart in a circular motion to deal heavy damage all around you.

[Grenade]  : Use the grapple to move forward quickly.
displayProperties.name: Silkstrike

displayProperties.description:
[Super]  : Summon three Void axes and throw them at your foes one after another. On impact, the axes pull in nearby targets and detonate in a weakening explosion. After exploding, the axes can be picked up by you or your allies and used as a weapon for a short time.

While carrying a Void axe:
[Light Attack]  : Slash forward with your axe, dealing damage and weakening targets.
[Heavy Attack]  : Throw the axe, consuming all remaining ammo.
displayProperties.name: Twilight Arsenal

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
Ability not yet unlocked.

Found in the Traveler's Pale Heart.

displayProperties.description:
Summon a flaming hammer and wreak destruction down upon your enemies.

[Light Attack]  : Throw your hammer at foes.

Upon impact, your hammers shatter into explosive molten shards.
displayProperties.name: Hammer of Sol

displayProperties.description: Hurtle through the air like a missile and crash into targets to inflict meteoric damage.
displayProperties.name: Thundercrash

displayProperties.description:
Summon a [Stasis] Stasis gauntlet. While your Super is active:

[Heavy Attack]  : Slam your gauntlet down to create a shockwave that freezes targets and sends out [Stasis] Stasis crystals to freeze additional ones.

[Light Attack]  : Supercharge your Shiver Strike for bonus damage. Sprint through [Stasis] Stasis crystals or frozen targets to shatter them instantly.
displayProperties.name: Glacial Quake

displayProperties.description:
[Super]  : Create two woven blades and roam the battlefield. While active:

[Light Attack]  : Perform a leaping slash towards nearby targets, severing them on hit and dealing bonus damage to suspended targets. Each successful hit briefly increases your attack speed and grants energy for your heavy attack.

[Heavy Attack]  : Unleash a heavy upward slash, creating two suspending projectiles that seek out targets.
displayProperties.name: Bladefury

displayProperties.description:
Unleash your inner fire, making your equipped weapons radiant and enhancing your abilities.

[Melee]  : Release a supercharged melee attack that launches additional projectiles.

[Grenade]  : Create a sentient flame wisp that seeks out targets and detonates in a scorching explosion, then seeks out other nearby targets.

While Song of Flame is active, you and nearby allies regenerate abilities more quickly, are more resistant to incoming damage, and your [Solar] Solar and Kinetic weapons scorch targets.
displayProperties.name: Song of Flame

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
Ability not yet unlocked.

Found in the Traveler's Pale Heart.

displayProperties.description:
Hurl an explosive bolt of Void Light at a target, disintegrating those caught within its blast.

Nova Bomb travels slowly and seeks targets. Detonations shatter into smaller seeker projectiles.
displayProperties.name: Nova Bomb: Cataclysm

displayProperties.description:
Chain Arc Lightning from your hands to electrify targets with devastating streams of Arc Light that intensify over time. Casting Stormtrance creates a jolting shockwave underneath you.

[Sprint]  : Teleport forward, consuming a small amount of Super energy.
displayProperties.name: Stormtrance

displayProperties.description:
Summon a [Stasis] Stasis staff. While your Super is active:

[Super Primary]  : Cast out a barrage of [Stasis] Stasis shards that freeze targets.

[Super Secondary]  : Cast out a shockwave that shatters all frozen targets.
displayProperties.name: Winter's Wrath

displayProperties.description:
[Super]  : Conjure a hail of deadly woven needles.

After embedding themselves in the environment, the needles will re-weave into a host of Threadlings.

Threadlings you create will return to you and perch if they can't find any nearby targets. Damaging targets with your weapons or melee will send out perched Threadlings to attack.
displayProperties.name: Needlestorm

displayProperties.description:
Toss a [Stasis] Stasis Shuriken at targets to damage and slow them.  

Provides multiple charges.
displayProperties.name: Withering Blade

displayProperties.description: Throw a Smoke Bomb that attaches to surfaces and pings target radar, then detonates into a disorienting smoke cloud, weakening nearby targets. Targets within the smoke cloud take damage over time.
displayProperties.name: Snare Bomb

displayProperties.description: Throw a fan of flaming knives that scorch targets on hit.
displayProperties.name: Knife Trick

displayProperties.description:
A quick strike that temporarily increases your melee damage when defeating a target, stacking three times.

Defeating targets with this ability also fully refills your class ability energy and restores a small amount of health.
displayProperties.name: Combination Blow

displayProperties.description: Throw a rope dart that bounces between targets, damaging and severing them. The dart will return to you once it's done, returning melee energy to you for each target hit. Press [Melee] just as the dart gets back to you to catch it and increase the amount of energy returned.
displayProperties.name: Threaded Spike

displayProperties.description: Hurl your Void Shield toward a target. The shield can ricochet off targets and surfaces, granting Overshield for each target hit.
displayProperties.name: Shield Throw

displayProperties.description: Hold input to leap through the air. Releasing unleashes a powerful dash attack that knocks targets back and damages them.
displayProperties.name: Shiver Strike

displayProperties.description:
After sprinting for a short time, use this melee ability to swing a blazing hammer that scorches your target and deals damage in a cone behind them.

If your target is defeated by Hammer Strike, they ignite.
displayProperties.name: Hammer Strike

displayProperties.description:
[Melee] : Hold while grounded to plant your feet and begin charging your fist with Arc energy.

[Melee] : Release to unleash a devastating blast in front of you, dealing damage that increases with longer charge time.
displayProperties.name: Thunderclap

displayProperties.description: Activate your charged melee ability to dash forward, slashing at targets in front of you and severing them.
displayProperties.name: Frenzied Blade

displayProperties.description: Sling a woven needle that will embed in your target, unraveling them. Activate your melee ability again to chain up to two additional attacks.
displayProperties.name: Arcane Needle

displayProperties.description: Launch an unstable ball of Void energy that detonates when it nears a target, pushing them away from the blast and making them volatile.
displayProperties.name: Pocket Singularity

displayProperties.description: Snap your fingers to create a fan of burning sparks that explode and scorch targets.
displayProperties.name: Incinerator Snap

displayProperties.description:
An extended range melee that jolts your target and chains lightning to nearby targets.

While amplified, it creates an additional set of chains.
displayProperties.name: Chain Lightning

displayProperties.description: Raise your [Stasis] Stasis staff against your foe. Send a blast of [Stasis] Stasis forward to freeze your targets.
displayProperties.name: Penumbral Blast

displayProperties.description:
Weave a grappling hook, and quickly pull yourself forward. Grappling to a Tangle immediately recharges your grenade energy.

During and shortly after grappling, your melee attack deals area damage and unravels targets.
displayProperties.name: Grapple

displayProperties.description: A grenade that attaches to targets and explodes twice.
displayProperties.name: Magnetic Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that detonates on impact, releasing multiple drones that seek nearby targets. Each drone slightly scorches affected targets.
displayProperties.name: Swarm Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that chains bolts of lightning to nearby targets.
displayProperties.name: Arcbolt Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that shatters on impact, leaving behind a field that slows targets and freezes those who do not leave the volume.
displayProperties.name: Duskfield Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that creates walls out of [Stasis] Stasis crystals to block damage and freeze targets; these walls can be shattered for damage.
displayProperties.name: Glacier Grenade

displayProperties.description: An explosive grenade that suppresses, preventing targets from using abilities for a short time.
displayProperties.name: Suppressor Grenade

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
Ability not yet unlocked.

This ability can be unlocked by speaking with Ikora Rey in the Tower Bazaar.

Ability requires meditation.

Use the meditation device near Ikora Rey in the Tower Bazaar to unlock.

displayProperties.description: A grenade that sends forth a burning line of fire, dealing damage and scorching targets in its path.
displayProperties.name: Thermite Grenade

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
Ability not yet unlocked.

This ability can be unlocked by speaking with Ikora Rey in the Tower Bazaar.

Ability requires meditation.

Use the meditation device near Ikora Rey in the Tower Bazaar to unlock.

displayProperties.description: A grenade that periodically damages targets within its explosion radius.
displayProperties.name: Pulse Grenade

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
Ability not yet unlocked.

This ability can be unlocked by speaking with Ikora Rey in the Tower Bazaar.

Ability requires meditation.

Use the meditation device near Ikora Rey in the Tower Bazaar to unlock.

displayProperties.description: A thrown weapon of weighted Strand matter that detonates on impact, suspending targets and creating additional suspending subprojectiles.
displayProperties.name: Shackle Grenade

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
Ability not yet unlocked.

This ability can be unlocked by visiting the Pouka Pond in Neomuna.

displayProperties.description: A grenade that creates a Vortex that pulls targets inward and continually damages those trapped inside.
displayProperties.name: Vortex Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that cures allies on impact and creates an Orb of benevolent Solar Light, granting restoration to allies when picked up.
displayProperties.name: Healing Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that calls down a focused lightning storm.
displayProperties.name: Storm Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that freezes on impact and sends another seeker to find and freeze targets.
displayProperties.name: Coldsnap Grenade

displayProperties.description: A woven projectile that reweaves itself into Threadlings while in flight.
displayProperties.name: Threadling Grenade

displayProperties.description: Dodge to perform an evasive maneuver with a steady hand. Dodging automatically reloads your weapon.
displayProperties.name: Marksman's Dodge

displayProperties.description: Dodge to perform a deft tumble, avoiding enemy attacks. Dodging near enemies fully recharges your Melee Ability.
displayProperties.name: Gambler's Dodge

displayProperties.description: Dodge to perform an acrobatic leap. Upon landing, make yourself and nearby allies radiant.
displayProperties.name: Acrobat's Dodge

displayProperties.description: Create a large barrier that can be used to reinforce a position with cover from enemy fire.
displayProperties.name: Towering Barricade

displayProperties.description: Create a small barrier that you can peek over while aiming down sights and that increases weapon reload speed, stability, and range when you stand behind it.
displayProperties.name: Rally Barricade

displayProperties.description: While grounded, quickly evade in a lateral direction.
displayProperties.name: Thruster

displayProperties.description: Conjure a well of power that continuously heals those inside it.
displayProperties.name: Healing Rift

displayProperties.description: Conjure a well of power that increases weapon damage for those inside it.
displayProperties.name: Empowering Rift

displayProperties.description: Dive to the ground and create a burst of Solar Light that cures nearby allies.
displayProperties.name: Phoenix Dive

displayProperties.description: While airborne, jump a second time to reach greater heights.
displayProperties.name: High Jump

displayProperties.description: While airborne, jump a second time with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Jump

displayProperties.description: While airborne, sustain your air control with a second or third jump.
displayProperties.name: Triple Jump

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to teleport a short distance.
displayProperties.name: Blink

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air to greater heights.
displayProperties.name: High Lift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Lift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with a strong initial burst of momentum.
displayProperties.name: Catapult Lift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Glide

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with a strong initial boost of speed.
displayProperties.name: Burst Glide

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with both moderate speed and directional control.
displayProperties.name: Balanced Glide

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to teleport a short distance.
displayProperties.name: Blink

displayProperties.description: [Grenade]  : Throw a device charged with [Stasis] Stasis matter and [Solar] Solar energy that attaches to surfaces or targets, then erupts into a slowing storm. After a short duration, the device ignites, creating a deadly scorching cyclone.
displayProperties.name: Hailfire Spike

displayProperties.description: [Grenade]  : Throw a mass of [Void] Void energy and [Stasis] Stasis matter. On impact, deploys a miniature black hole orbited by a slowing field. After a short duration, the black hole implodes, suppressing and dealing heavy damage to all nearby targets.
displayProperties.name: Freezing Singularity

displayProperties.description: [Grenade]  : Throw an explosive device energized with [Strand] Strand matter and [Arc] Arc energy that detonates in a supercharged suspending burst. The suspended target takes heavy damage over time and chains jolting lightning to any nearby targets.
displayProperties.name: Electrified Snare

displayProperties.description:
Achieve harmony by dealing damage with Light and Dark damage types in equal measure or by applying subclass buffs to your allies. Kinetic damage generates both Light and Dark energy.

While Transcendence is active, your grenade is replaced by a unique Prismatic grenade that deals both Light and Dark damage. Dealing melee damage while transcendent greatly increases your grenade energy regeneration, and vice versa. Defeating targets while transcendent extends its duration.
displayProperties.name: Transcendence

displayProperties.description:
Achieve harmony by dealing damage with Light and Dark damage types in equal measure or by applying subclass buffs to your allies. Kinetic damage generates both Light and Dark energy.

While Transcendence is active, your grenade is replaced by a unique Prismatic grenade that deals both Light and Dark damage. Dealing melee damage while transcendent greatly increases your grenade energy regeneration, and vice versa. Defeating targets while transcendent extends its duration.
displayProperties.name: Transcendence

displayProperties.description:

displayProperties.name: Transcendence

displayProperties.description:
Includes the Red War story campaign.

Humanity's Last Safe City has fallen to an overwhelming invasion force led by Dominus Ghaul, the imposing commander of the brutal Red Legion. He has stripped the City's Guardians of their power and forced the survivors to flee. You will venture to mysterious, unexplored worlds of our solar system to discover an arsenal of devastating weapons and powerful armor.

You can pick up this quest from Amanda Holliday in the Tower Hangar.
displayProperties.name: The Red War

displayProperties.description:
Includes the Curse of Osiris story campaign.

Uncover the true story of the greatest Warlock who ever lived, unravel the mystery of the Infinite Forest, and stop the Vex from ushering in a dark future where only they remain.

You can pick up this quest from Amanda Holliday in the Tower Hangar.
displayProperties.name: Curse of Osiris

displayProperties.description:
Includes the Warmind story campaign.

Golden Age satellites slam into the surface of the Hellas Basin on Mars. Icy glaciers thaw, revealing the core of the Warmind Rasputin—and an ancient Hive army, bent on its destruction.

You can pick up this quest from Amanda Holliday in the Tower Hangar.
displayProperties.name: Warmind

displayProperties.description: Upgrade your arsenal with the Forsaken Pack, which includes access to more than 20 Forsaken Exotic weapons, the "Shattered Throne" dungeon, and "Last Wish" raid. Owners also get 3 Forsaken Ciphers to instantly unlock any 3 Forsaken Exotic weapons of their choosing (raid and dungeon weapons excluded).
displayProperties.name: Forsaken Pack

displayProperties.description:
The Shadowkeep Pack introduces over 15 Exotic weapons and armor to collect, the "Garden of Salvation" raid, "Pit of Heresy" dungeon, and Scarlet Keep Nightfall. 

The Shadowkeep campaign is free in Destiny 2 and does not require this pack.
displayProperties.name: Shadowkeep Pack

displayProperties.description:
The Beyond Light Pack introduces over 15 Exotic weapons and armor to collect, the "Deep Stone Crypt" raid, as well as two Nightfalls: The Glassway and Proving Grounds. 

The Beyond Light campaign and Stasis subclass are free in Destiny 2 and do not require this pack.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light Pack

displayProperties.description: Savathûn has been brought out of hiding, revealing a harrowing discovery that shakes the Vanguard. As Xivu Arath prepares to capture her sister, Savathûn offers you a bargain: free her from her worm, and she will reveal the truth about the Darkness.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Lost

displayProperties.description: Xûr invites you to the shores of Eternity where your skill will be tested… and rewarded. Celebrate 30 years of Bungie with new content that pays homage to a legendary legacy of gaming.
displayProperties.name: Bungie 30th Anniversary Pack

displayProperties.description:
Delve into Savathûn's twisted throne world to uncover the mystery of how she and her Lucent Brood stole the Light.

Learn the secrets required to craft all-new weapons, a new weapon archetype, and take back the Light.
displayProperties.name: The Witch Queen

displayProperties.description:
Delve into Savathûn's twisted throne world to uncover the mystery of how she and her Lucent Brood stole the Light. Learn the secrets required to craft all-new weapons, including a new Glaive weapon archetype, and take back the Light.

The Deluxe Edition includes The Witch Queen expansion plus 4 Seasons of Destiny 2 (begins on 2.22.22), two new dungeons in Year 5, a new Exotic SMG with catalyst and ornament, and a new Throne World Exotic Sparrow.
displayProperties.name: The Witch Queen Deluxe Edition

displayProperties.description: The Witch Queen Deluxe Edition + Bungie 30th Anniv. Bundle combines all the content from both The Witch Queen Deluxe Edition and the Bungie 30th Anniversary Pack.
displayProperties.name: The Witch Queen Deluxe + 30th Anniv. Bundle

displayProperties.description: When Savathûn's Lucent Hive threaten the source of the Guardians' power, survival depends on the fragile alliance between the Vanguard and Empress Caiatl. Wielding a spear imbued with Light-suppressing technology, the Guardian must work with Lord Saladin and Caiatl's most trusted Psion to search for secrets in the minds of the Lucent Hive and stop their ghoulish plans.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Risen

displayProperties.description: The Witch Queen Dungeon Key provides access to two dungeons: "Duality" and "Spire of the Watcher."
displayProperties.name: The Witch Queen Dungeon Key

displayProperties.description: The prison ship of the exiled Cabal Emperor Calus has returned. But its reappearance heralds the beginning of the end as the once-dormant lunar Pyramid stirs to life once more. With the aid of Eris Morn's witchcraft, the Guardian must work with Empress Caiatl, Commander Zavala, and Crow to unravel the mysteries of the Leviathan and the lunar Pyramid and stop Calus before it is too late.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Haunted

displayProperties.description: Purchase Season of the Haunted and 10 bonus Season Pass ranks.
displayProperties.name: Season Pass + 10 Ranks

displayProperties.description: Instantly acquire 10 Season Pass ranks for Season of the Haunted.
displayProperties.name: 10 Season Ranks

displayProperties.description: Upgrading the Event Card unlocks the ability to spend Event Tickets to claim additional rewards (including the Instant Rewards bundle). The Upgraded Event Card expires at the end of the event.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Event Card Upgrade

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Tickets will expire at the end of this event.

displayProperties.description: Eramis, Kell of House Salvation, has broken free from her icy prison on Europa. As she rallies the old Pirate Lords of Eliksni legend, the Guardian must assemble a motley crew of their own and retrieve powerful relics of Darkness before they fall into Eramis's hands.
displayProperties.name: Season of Plunder

displayProperties.description: Purchase Season of Plunder and 10 bonus Season Pass ranks.
displayProperties.name: Season of Plunder + 10 Ranks

displayProperties.description: Instantly acquire 10 Season Pass ranks for Season of Plunder.
displayProperties.name: 10 Season Ranks

displayProperties.description: Assist Ana Bray and Osiris in finding a way to restore the Warmind, Rasputin, in order to combat the enemies of Sol.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Seraph

displayProperties.description: A bundle containing the Season of the Seraph and 10 Season ranks!
displayProperties.name: Season of the Seraph +10-Rank Bundle

displayProperties.description: A bundle containing 10 Season ranks for Season of the Seraph!
displayProperties.name: 10-Rank Bundle for Season of the Seraph

displayProperties.description:
Prevent the apocalypse by racing Emperor Calus to the edge of the solar system. 

Discover a new destination and master Strand, a new subclass.
displayProperties.name: Destiny 2: Lightfall

displayProperties.description:
Prevent the apocalypse by racing Emperor Calus to the edge of the solar system. Brave a new campaign and master Strand, a new subclass. Purchase to instantly unlock Quicksilver Storm Exotic weapon and exclusive bonuses.

The Annual Pass Edition includes Lightfall, two new dungeons and four seasons of Destiny 2 in Year 6, a new Exotic Sparrow, Quicksilver Storm catalyst and ornament, and Rahool's Secret Stash: four Exotic accessories and premium materials pack delivered throughout Year 6.
displayProperties.name: Destiny 2: Lightfall + Annual Pass

displayProperties.description:
Prevent the apocalypse by racing Emperor Calus to the edge of the solar system. Brave a new campaign and master Strand, a new subclass. Pre-order now to instantly unlock Quicksilver Storm Exotic weapon and exclusive bonuses.

In addition to everything in the Annual Pass Edition, the Premium Edition includes Rahool's Secret Stash: an Exotic accessory and premium currency bundle delivered at the start of each Season in Year 6.
displayProperties.name: Destiny 2: Lightfall Premium Edition

displayProperties.description: In the aftermath of the Witness's attack, the Vanguard calls upon its closest allies. The Guardian must master the righteous powers of the Awoken to stand against the encroaching Shadow Legion and prove themselves as Queensguard.
displayProperties.name: Season of Defiance

displayProperties.description: A bundle containing the Season of Defiance and 10 Season ranks!
displayProperties.name: Season of Defiance +10-Rank Bundle

displayProperties.description: A bundle containing 10 Season ranks for Season of Defiance!
displayProperties.name: 10-Rank Bundle for Season of Defiance

displayProperties.description: The Lightfall Dungeon Key provides access to two dungeons during Year 6.
displayProperties.name: Lightfall Dungeon Key

displayProperties.description:
The final shape looms—a nightmarish calcification of reality into the Witness's twisted design. Embark on an adventure into the heart of the Traveler, harness the power of three new Super abilities, and finish the War of Light and Darkness. 

Includes The Final Shape story campaign, a new destination, three new Supers, new weapons and armor to collect, and the first Episode in the year of The Final Shape.
displayProperties.name: Destiny 2: The Final Shape

displayProperties.description:
The final shape looms—a nightmarish calcification of reality into the Witness's twisted design. Embark on an adventure into the heart of the Traveler, harness the power of three new Super abilities, and finish the War of Light and Darkness. 

The Annual Pass edition includes The Final Shape story campaign, a new destination, three new Supers, new weapons and armor to collect, The Final Shape Dungeon Key, catalyst and ornament for the Tessellation Exotic, one Secret Stash delivered during each Episode, Exotic Sparrow, and all three Episodes in the year of The Final Shape.
displayProperties.name: Destiny 2: The Final Shape + Annual Pass
